data.strFullDescription:
This game is a free version of Inn Tycoon.

Embark on a soothing journey to the medieval ages with Inn Tycoon: Prologue – a chill and relaxing game where you shape the serenity of a bygone era. Delicious meals and ice-cold beverages await your service to customers. Increase reputation with various room options and customized furniture. Your dream inn awaits you to experience this magnificent atmosphere.

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3064020/extras/81546150725a374908428245ea94f60f.poster.avif?t=1729076986" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3064020/extras/81546150725a374908428245ea94f60f.webm?t=1729076986" width="616" height="346"][/imgvid]

[h2]RECRUIT STAFF FOR BEST SERVICE[/h2]

Recruit a team of skilled staff to ensure your inn runs like clockwork. From chefs and maids to entertainers, each employee plays a crucial role in creating a seamless and enjoyable stay for your guests. Your customers might be impatient, be careful not to upset them. Remember, Quality Service = Good Tips.

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3064020/extras/bce1472fb526c38303fec71addd66c37.poster.avif?t=1729076986" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3064020/extras/bce1472fb526c38303fec71addd66c37.webm?t=1729076986" width="646" height="362"][/imgvid]

[h2]UNEXPECTED SEASONAL CHANGES[/h2]

Sometimes a cold snowy day, sometimes scorching heat. The frequently changing weather will be felt inside the inn as well. You’ll need to adapt to unexpected situations and handle the varying demands of your customers.

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3064020/extras/102dfe8be3232e9696219b2549fbc193.poster.avif?t=1729076986" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3064020/extras/102dfe8be3232e9696219b2549fbc193.webm?t=1729076986" width="616" height="352"][/imgvid]

[h2]USE REPUTATION TO CREATE FESTIVALS[/h2]

You’ll be able to organize events and festivals with the fame you’ve gained. Experience chill and relaxing inn management while hearing the music and laughter echoing through the walls.
data.strSnippet: Welcome to Inn Tycoon: Prologue! Build, design, and manage your dream inn. Serve delightful meals, offer various services, and hire a stellar staff. Create a top-notch hospitality empire and become the ultimate Inn Tycoon!
